languages.english-overview:
Soholaunch is an easy-to-use website builder designed to help you build, maintain, and manage your personal or business website.
It runs right from your website, making it easy to take shopping cart orders online, create forms, and edit site pages from any computer in the world!
Soholaunch is launched under END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT (EULA).

ul.li: Add photos, videos, PDF’s, and dozens of other features to your pages with Soholaunch’s easy, drag-and-drop Page Editor and simple file uploading tools.

Ready to sell your products? Soholaunch includes a comprehensive shopping cart feature that’s so capable, we could sell it on its own. Products, categories, coupons, UPS and FedEx, international currencies, PayPal, and way more.

Protect pages with usernames and passwords, import members rosters from MS Excel, offer wholesale pricing, create members-only events, and more with Soholaunch's comprehensive membership management features.

Add videos from popular services like YouTuband Vimeo or upload your own movie files. Soholaunch also includes audio features so you can add your .mp3, .wav, and .ogg audio files to your pages and visitors can play them.

No HTML or coding skills required. You can use all of Soholaunch’s features even if you’ve never built a website before. Note: There’s plenty of customization options if you do have experience. See our Developers page for more on that.

Blogging is one of the best ways to increase traffic to your website, and it shows your visitors that you have a passion for your topic. Soholaunch Ultra includes powerful blogging tools to help you write lots and keep it organized.
Soholaunch includes all the popular social network share buttons, so you can make it easy for visitors to share your content on Facebook , Google+, Twitter , Pinterest , and StumbleUpon.

Google Analytics is the most powerful web statistics package available, and it’s already built-in to Soholaunch Ultra. It will show you what your visitors like and don’t like, so you can tailor your website accordingly.

Do you have news and product specials you’d like to share with your customers? Our Newsletter feature makes it easy for you to design content and send it out to your customers, so you can keep them interested and up to date.

Create your own custom web forms with Soholaunch’s built-in web form builder. You can build everything from simple “Contact Us” forms to long application and event registration forms, and even include "upload a file" fields.

Are you building a website for a club, class, or an organization? Do you have lots of events to advertise? Our comprehensive Event Calendar feature helps you show your events to your website visitors, and also sell registrations if you want.
Want peace of mind while making changes to your website? With our Site Backup/Restore feature, there is virtually nothing you can mess up that cannot be fully restored with the click of a button.

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
